owned cards.name: Made in a Lab
owned cards.effects text: When purchasing cards you can peek at and purchase the top card of the deck

owned cards.name: Energy Hoarder
owned cards.effects text: You gain 1 VP for every 6 energy you have at the end of your turn

owned cards.name: Camouflage
owned cards.effects text: If you take damage, roll a die for each damage point. On a HEALTH, you do not take that damage point.

owned cards.name: Background Dweller
owned cards.effects text: You can always roll any 3s you have

owned cards.name: Plot Twist
owned cards.effects text: Change one die to any result. Discard when used

owned cards.name: Complete Destruction
owned cards.effects text: If you roll 1-2-3-HEAL-ATK-ENERGY gain 9 VP in addition to the regular results

card shop.name: Eater of the Dead
card shop.effects text: Gain 3 VP every time a Monster's health goes to 0

card shop.name: Made in a Lab
card shop.effects text: When purchasing cards you can peek at and purchase the top card of the deck

card shop.name: Plot Twist
card shop.effects text: Change one die to any result. Discard when used

power card deck.name: Death From Above
power card deck.effects text: +2 VPs and take control of Tokyo if you don't already control it

power card deck.name: Shrink Ray
power card deck.effects text: When you deal damage, give each Monster damaged a Shrink token. A monster rolls one less die for each Shrink token. A monster can get rid of a Shrink token with a HEALTH instead of using it to heal damage

power card deck.name: Background Dweller
power card deck.effects text: You can always roll any 3s you have
